    • 构造器详细资料

      • Builder

        public Builder()

    • 方法详细资料

      • connectTimeout

        public TcrSessionConfig.Builder connectTimeout​(long connectTimeout)
        Set the connection timeout period, i.e., the timeout period from the connection initiation to the reception of the first frame. `TcrSessionListener.onError(int, String)` will be called back for a timeout. `errorCode` is `TcrError.ERROR_TIMEOUT`.
        参数:
        connectTimeout - Unit: Millisecond. Default value: 15 seconds.

      • idleThreshold

        public TcrSessionConfig.Builder idleThreshold​(long idleThreshold)
        The idleness detection threshold, i.e., the duration for detecting when a user performs no operations If the threshold is reached, `TcrSessionListener.onEvent(String, String)` will be called back. `event` is `TcrEvent.EVENT_IDLE`.
        参数:
        idleThreshold - Unit: Millisecond. Default value: 5 minutes.

      • enableAudioTrack

        public TcrSessionConfig.Builder enableAudioTrack​(boolean enableAudioTrack)
        Whether to enable audio upstreaming for the session. Default value: `false`. If the parameter is set to `true`, the created `TcrSession` will have an audio track. You can further use the `TcrSession#enableMic()` method to enable the mic to upstream the audio of the local mic to the cloud instance.
        参数:
        enableAudioTrack - Default value: `false`.

      • setVideoFrameCallback

        public TcrSessionConfig.Builder setVideoFrameCallback​(VideoFrameBufferCallback videoFrameBufferCallback)
        Set custom video data callback. Pass in the video callback and decode and render by itself after getting the video frame data
        参数:
        videoFrameBufferCallback - Video data callback

      • setAudioSampleCallback

        public TcrSessionConfig.Builder setAudioSampleCallback​(AudioSampleCallback audioSampleCallback)
        Set the consumer for WebRTC decoded audio data. If not set, the decoded audio data will be played directly.
        参数:
        audioSampleCallback - A consumer of externally incoming audio data.

      • lowFpsThreshold

        public TcrSessionConfig.Builder lowFpsThreshold​(int fps,
                                                int duration)
        Set the threshold for a low frame rate notification. If the threshold is reached, a callback will be triggered. TcrSessionListener.onEvent(String, String) `event` is `TcrEvent.EVENT_LOW_FPS`.
        参数:
        fps - The threshold for a low frame rate notification. If the value is less than 0, notification will be disabled. Default value: `-1`.
        duration - The duration during which consecutive frame rates are below `fps` in seconds. If the value is less than 0, notification will be disabled. Default value: `-1`.

      • enableLocalVideo

        public TcrSessionConfig.Builder enableLocalVideo​(boolean enable,
                                                 int videoWidth,
                                                 int videoHeight,
                                                 int videoFps,
                                                 int videoBitrate,
                                                 boolean isFontCamera)
        Enable/Disable local video upstreaming. Note: The parameter resolution width, height, and frame rate must be greater than 0; otherwise, video upstreaming will be considered failed to be enabled.
        参数:
        enable - Valid values: `true`: Enable; `false`: Disable.
        videoWidth - The resolution width of the upstreamed video, which must be greater than 0.
        videoHeight - The resolution height of the upstreamed video, which must be greater than 0.
        videoFps - The frame rate of the upstreamed video
        videoBitrate - The bitrate of the upstreamed video
        isFontCamera - Whether to use the front camera for video upstreaming

      • build

        public TcrSessionConfig build()
        Construct a `TcrSessionConfig`.
        返回:
        The returned value is not `null`.
